00026 bool FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback(const SimpleString fullname, const SimpleString hosttarget, uint16_t port, uint16_t txtLen, const SimpleString txtRecord, void * UserData)
00027 {
00028     OmiscidServiceSearchData * MyData = (OmiscidServiceSearchData *)UserData;
00029
00030     // printf( "%u;", GetTickCount() );
00031
00032     SimpleString Host(hosttarget);
00033     ServiceProperties PropertiesForProxy;
00034
00035     PropertiesForProxy.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, (const unsigned char*)txtRecord.GetStr() );
00036
00037     // Need to add id of the service
00038     if ( PropertiesForProxy.IsDefined(PeerIdString) )
00039     {
00040 #ifdef DEBUG
00041         OmiscidError( "Property id defined in TxtRecord as '%s'. Old style Service ?\n", PropertiesForProxy[PeerIdString].GetValue().GetStr() );
00042 #endif
00043     }
00044
00045     // Create search pattern
00046     SimpleString TmpString(".");
00047     TmpString += CommonServiceValues::OmiscidServiceDnsSdType; // for example, "." + "_bip._tcp";
00048
00049     // Search it
00050     int Protocol = fullname.Find( TmpString.GetStr() );
00051     SimpleString NewId("c");
00052     if ( Protocol >= 0 )
00053     {
00054         // Create a constant value with the name
00055         NewId += "/";
00056         NewId += fullname.SubString( 0, Protocol );
00057     }
00058     PropertiesForProxy[PeerIdString] = NewId;
00059
00060     // To say if the service is the one we are looking for...
00061     ServiceProxy * SP = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxy( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), Host, port, PropertiesForProxy ); // MyData->PeerId
00062     if ( SP == NULL )
00063     {
00064         // printf( "%u;\n", GetTickCount() );
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067
00068     // printf( "%u;", GetTickCount() );
00069     if ( MyData->Filter->IsAGoodService( *SP ) == false )
00070     {
00071         // printf( "%u;\n", GetTickCount() );
00072         delete SP;
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075
00076     // printf("%u;\n", GetTickCount() );
00077     // Return the found service
00078     MyData->Proxy = SP;
00079     return true;
00080 }
00081
00082 } // namespace Omiscid

00095 Service::Service(const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString ClassName)
00096     : ControlServer( ServiceName )
00097 {
00098     if ( ClassName.IsEmpty() )
00099     {
00100         SetClass( DefaultServiceClassName );
00101     }
00102     else
00103     {
00104         SetClass( ClassName );
00105     }

00108 Service::~Service()
00109 {
00110     // Destroy our created ComTools
00111     ComTools * pComTools;
00112
00113     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00114     {
00115         pComTools = listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetComTool();
00116         if ( pComTools )
00117         {
00118             // Destroy it
00119             delete pComTools;
00120             // Set the com tools to null
00121             listInOutput.GetCurrent()->SetComTool(NULL);
00122         }
00123     }
00124 }

00137 bool Service::AddConnector(SimpleString ConnectorName, SimpleString ConnectorDescription, ConnectorKind ConnectorKind)
00138 {
00139     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00140     if ( pAtt != NULL )
00141     {
00142         OmiscidError( "A connector named '%s' is already defined.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145
00146     Connector * pConnector = new OMISCID_TLM Connector();
00147     if ( pConnector == NULL )
00148     {
00149         OmiscidError( "Could not allocate a new connector\n" );
00150         return false;
00151     }
00152
00153     // Create TCP and UDP ports
00154     pConnector->SetName(ConnectorName);
00155     pConnector->Create();
00156     pAtt = AddInOutput( ConnectorName, pConnector, ConnectorKind );
00157     pAtt->SetDescription( ConnectorDescription );
00158
00159     return true;
00160 }

00167 bool Service::SendToAllClients(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, bool FastSend )
00168 {
00169     if ( Buffer == NULL && BufferLen != 0 )
00170     {
00171         OmiscidError( "Could not send (null) buffer\n" );
00172         return false;
00173     }
00174     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00175     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00176     {
00177         OmiscidError( "Could not find connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00178         return false;
00179     }
00180     if ( pAtt->IsAnInput() )
00181     {
00182         OmiscidError( "Could not send data on an input connector.\n" );
00183         return false;
00184     }
00185
00186     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00187
00188     // if ReliableSend == true, we should send over udp so the last parameter (udp send)
00189     // must be true
00190     pConnector->SendToAll( BufferLen, Buffer, FastSend );
00191
00192     return true;
00193 }

00205 bool Service::SendToOneClient(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, int PeerId, bool FastSend )
00206 {
00207     if ( Buffer == NULL && BufferLen != 0 )
00208     {
00209         OmiscidError( "Could not send (null) buffer\n" );
00210         return false;
00211     }
00212     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00213     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00214     {
00215         OmiscidError( "Could not find connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00216         return false;
00217     }
00218     if ( pAtt->IsAnInput() )
00219     {
00220         OmiscidError( "Could not send data on an input connector.\n" );
00221         return false;
00222     }
00223
00224     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00225
00226     // What is it ?
00227     // if ( pConnector->GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP() <= BufferLen )
00228
00229     // if ReliableSend == true, we should send over udp so the last parameter (udp send)
00230     // must be true
00231     if ( pConnector->SendToPeer( BufferLen, Buffer, PeerId, FastSend ) <= 0 )
00232     {
00233         return false;
00234     }
00235
00236     return true;
00237 }

00250 bool Service::SendToOneClient(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, ServiceProxy* ServProxy, bool FastSend )

00267 bool Service::AddVariable(SimpleString VarName, SimpleString Type, SimpleString VarDescription, VariableAccessType AccessType)
00268 {
00269     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00270     if ( pVar != NULL )
00271     {
00272         OmiscidError( "A variable named '%s' is already defined.\n", VarName.GetStr() );
00273         return false;
00274     }
00275
00276     pVar = ControlServer::AddVariable( VarName );
00277     if ( pVar == NULL )
00278     {
00279         OmiscidError( "Could not allocate a new variable\n" );
00280         return false;
00281     }
00282
00283     // Set access type
00284     pVar->SetType( Type );
00285     pVar->SetDescription( VarDescription );
00286     pVar->SetAccess( AccessType );
00287
00288     return true;
00289 }

00405 bool Service::AddLocalVariableListener(SimpleString VarName, LocalVariableListener * Listener)
00406 {
00407     VariableAttribute * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00408     if ( pVar == NULL )
00409     {
00410         return false;
00411     }
00412
00413     // Add a pointer to myself in this listener
00414     Listener->SetUserData( this );
00415
00416     // Ask to add the listenner
00417     return pVar->AddListener( Listener );
00418 }

00444 bool Service::ConnectTo(SimpleString LocalConnector, ServiceProxy& ServProxy, SimpleString RemoteConnector)
00445 {
00446     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( LocalConnector );
00447     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00448     {
00449         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", LocalConnector.GetStr() );
00450         return false;
00451     }
00452
00453     ConnectionInfos Connection;
00454     if ( ServProxy.GetConnectionInfos( RemoteConnector, Connection ) == false )
00455     {
00456         // OmiscidError already done in GetConnectionInfos
00457         return false;
00458     }
00459
00460     // Check compatibility
00461     switch( pAtt->GetType() )
00462     {
00463         case AnInput:
00464             // Can connect only on output and inoutput
00465             if ( Connection.Type == AnInput )
00466             {
00467                 OmiscidError( "Cound not connect local input connector '%s' to another input connector '%s'\n", LocalConnector.GetStr(), RemoteConnector.GetStr() );
00468                 return false;
00469             }
00470             break;
00471
00472         case AnOutput:
00473             // Can connect only on input and inoutput
00474             if ( Connection.Type == AnOutput )
00475             {
00476                 OmiscidError( "Cound not connect local output connector '%s' to another output connector '%s'\n", LocalConnector.GetStr(), RemoteConnector.GetStr() );
00477                 return false;
00478             }
00479             break;
00480
00481         default:    // inoutput ans other
00482             // Can connect to every thing
00483             break;
00484
00485     }
00486
00487     // Ok, here we go
00488     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00489
00490     // Let's connect to him
00491     try
00492     {
00493         if ( pConnector->ConnectTo( ServProxy.GetHostName(), Connection.TcpPort ) == 0 )
00494         {
00495             return false;
00496         }
00497     }
00498     catch(SimpleException& e)
00499     {
00500         OmiscidError( "%s (%d)\n.", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00501         return false;
00502     }
00503
00504     return true;
00505 }
00506
00507 bool Service::ConnectTo(SimpleString LocalConnector, ServiceProxy* ServProxy, SimpleString RemoteConnector)
00508 {
00509     if ( ServProxy == NULL )
00510     {
00511         OmiscidError( "Coulnd not connect to (null) proxy service\n" );
00512         return false;
00513     }
00514     return ConnectTo(LocalConnector, *ServProxy, RemoteConnector);
00515 }

00522 bool Service::AddConnectorListener(SimpleString ConnectorName, ConnectorListener * MsgListener)
00523 {
00524     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00525     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00526     {
00527         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00528         return false;
00529     }
00530
00531     if ( pAtt->IsAnOutput() )    // can be Input, InOutput, but limited on Output
00532     {
00533         OmiscidError( "Could only receive connection/deconnecion notification over a simple output connector.\n" );
00534     }
00535
00536     // Get the connector
00537     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00538
00539     MsgListener->ServiceOfTheConnector = this;
00540
00541     // Link to receive messages
00542     return pConnector->AddCallbackObject( MsgListener );
00543 }

00550 bool Service::RemoveConnectorListener(SimpleString ConnectorName, ConnectorListener * MsgListener)
00551 {
00552     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00553     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00554     {
00555         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00556         return false;
00557     }
00558
00559     // Get the connector
00560     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00561
00562     // Link to receive messages
00563     return pConnector->RemoveCallbackObject( MsgListener );
00564 }

00570 // Static
00571 ServiceProxy * Service::FindService(ServiceFilter * Filter, unsigned int WaitTime)
00572 {
00573     if ( Filter == NULL )
00574     {
00575         return NULL;
00576     }
00577
00578     // We want to be sure that we destroy data in the rigth order
00579     // Let's do it by ourself
00580     WaitForOmiscidServices * WFOS = new OMISCID_TLM WaitForOmiscidServices;
00581     if ( WFOS == NULL )
00582     {
00583         return NULL;
00584     }
00585
00586     // Add serach information
00587     OmiscidServiceSearchData MyData;
00588
00589     // Ok, I will ask for services
00590     MyData.PeerId = GetServiceId();
00591     MyData.Filter = Filter;
00592
00593     // Ask to work on all service (we do not provide a name)
00594     WFOS->NeedService( WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback, (void*)&MyData);
00595     WFOS->WaitAll(WaitTime);
00596
00597     // Delete by ourself the object. Thus we are sure that
00598     // we will do it at the right time
00599     delete WFOS;
00600
00601     // Delete the filter
00602     delete Filter;
00603
00604     // If not found, return NULL
00605     return MyData.Proxy;
00606 }
00607
00608 ServiceProxy * Service::FindService(ServiceFilter& Filter, unsigned int WaitTime)
00609 {
00610     return FindService(Filter.Duplicate(), WaitTime);
00611 }
00612
00613 ServiceProxyList * Service::FindServices(ServiceFilterList& Filters, unsigned int WaitTime )
00614 {
00615     int i;
00616
00617     if ( Filters.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00618     {
00619         return NULL;
00620     }
00621
00622     // We want to be sure that we destroy data in the rigth order
00623     // Let's do it by ourself
00624     WaitForOmiscidServices *    WFOS = new OMISCID_TLM WaitForOmiscidServices;
00625     OmiscidServiceSearchData  * MyData;
00626
00627     if ( WFOS == NULL )
00628     {
00629         return NULL;
00630     }
00631
00632     for( Filters.First(); Filters.NotAtEnd(); Filters.Next() )
00633     {
00634         MyData = new OMISCID_TLM OmiscidServiceSearchData;
00635         if ( MyData == NULL )
00636         {
00637             // delete WaitForOmiscidServices object
00638             delete WFOS;
00639
00640             // Problem, return nothing
00641             return NULL;
00642         }
00643
00644         // Ok, I will ask for services
00645         MyData->PeerId = GetServiceId();
00646         MyData->Filter = Filters.GetCurrent();
00647
00648         // Ask to work on all service (we do not provide a name)
00649         WFOS->NeedService( WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback, (void*)MyData);
00650     }
00651
00652     // The final result
00653     ServiceProxyList * ResultServicesProxy = NULL;
00654
00655     // Let's serach for the services
00656     bool ret = WFOS->WaitAll(WaitTime);
00657
00658     // Stop the thread
00659     WFOS->StopThread();
00660
00661     if ( ret == true && (ResultServicesProxy = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxyList) != NULL )
00662     {
00663         // We found what we need and we manadge to construct a list
00664         // Add the resulting proxy to the list
00665         for( i = 0; i < WFOS->GetNbOfSearchedServices(); i++ )
00666         {
00667             ResultServicesProxy->AddTail( (static_cast<OmiscidServiceSearchData*>(WFOS->operator [](i).UserData))->Proxy );
00668         }
00669     }
00670
00671     // delete search object
00672     delete WFOS;
00673
00674     // Delete all OmiscidServiceSearchData used
00675     for( i = 0; i < WFOS->GetNbOfSearchedServices(); i++ )
00676     {
00677         // delete the current i-th OmiscidServiceSearchData
00678         delete static_cast<OmiscidServiceSearchData*>(WFOS->operator [](i).UserData);
00679     }
00680
00681     return ResultServicesProxy;
00682 }

00697 const SimpleString Service::GetPeerId()
00698 {
00699     return PeerIdVariable->GetValue();
